alert.note: Alert for Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 3:21PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Weber...southwestern Cache and east central Box Elder Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 321 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Mantua, or 13 miles east of Brigham City, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hyrum, Wellsville, Mantua, Nibley, Paradise and Avon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
